column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Unalaq 's a liar and a traitor ! "
#Text=Varrick says : " I 've been trying to tell you that from the get - go . "
#Text=Mako says : " What happened ? "
#Text=Korra says : " I found out the truth about my dad 's banishment .
#Text=It was a setup .
#Text=" Korra says : " Just like the whole trial .
#Text=I ca n't believe I trusted him .
#Text=I 'm busting my father and the rebels out of jail .
#Text=I need your help .
#Text=" Mako says : " If you do this , there 's no going back .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know .
#Text=Will you help me or not ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Of course , I 'll help .
#Text=" Asami says : " Me too .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Count me in !
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't even want to know .
#Text=" Asami says : " So I 'm guessing the breakup with Eska did n't go well ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , no , the honesty thing worked out great .
#Text=So great she decided we should get married !
#Text=" Asami says : " Sorry .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm pretty sure the guy is supposed to give the girl the betrothal necklace .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I guess Eska did n't get the memo .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Look , the only way to deal with crazy women is to lie big and leave fast .
#Text=Lucky for you , Varrick 's got your back .
#Text=Now , gather ' round Ping - Ping .
#Text=Let 's talk plan .
#Text="
